Request.name: Name
Request.description: Are you sure you want to delete this request? All of your data will be permanently removed. This action cannot be undone.
Request.requestReceived: A request received from the requester.
Request.requestButtons: Click on the button to Approve or Deny.
Request.receiveRequests: Get profile clicks, receive connection requests.
Request.receiveRequestsSubText: This feature allows users to receive requests when others request on your profile.

Banner.message: Profile is incomplete, Please fill all the required fields

FormFAB.nameError: Name must contain at least 2 character(s) in Personal Section
FormFAB.previewButton: Click on the preview button to see your resume.
FormFAB.browserNotSupported: Native sharing is not supported in this browser. You can manually copy the link by clicking the copy button and paste it wherever you want.

OutgoingRequest.sendRequests: View approved Resume upon request approval.
OutgoingRequest.sendRequestsSubText: Once your request is approved, you can easily access and assess the requested resumes.
OutgoingRequest.checkRequest: Check your request sent to the prospect.
OutgoingRequest.clickCard: Click on the name to view requested resume.
OutgoingRequest.visitViaPasscode: If you wish to visit via passcode, here it is. Just enter your passcode when you are asked.
OutgoingRequest.visitViaClick: The current status of your approval can be viewed here.

ReviewList.upgradePlanGotAllReview: Upgrade your plan to unlock all the reviews you've received on your resume from your peers.
ReviewList.upgradePlanAllReview: Upgrade your plan to unlock all the reviews on this resume from others peers.
ReviewList.unresolvedReviewsDesc: Resolve a review given by the reviewer.
ReviewList.resolvedReviewsDesc: All the Resolved reviews given by the reviewer
ReviewList.noReviewsToSee: Sorry, we couldn't find any reviews at the moment. Please check back later.

Requests.acceptDescription: Accept the request to share your resume.
Requests.denyDescription: Deny request to stop sharing your resume.
Requests.receiveRequests: Get profile clicks, receive connection requests.
Requests.receiveRequestsSubText: This feature allows users to receive requests when others request on your profile
Requests.acceptRequest: When you receive a request, you can accept or deny the request When you accept the request you are sharing your resume details. You can also control the accessibility of your resume. Just by Clicking on the deny button you can stop sharing your resume information with the requester.

Prospects.mailDescription: Mail your prospect regardless of approval.
Prospects.acceptApproval: This feature gets enabled only on Approval of your request.
Prospects.viewApprovals: View approved Resume upon request approval.
Prospects.checkApprovals: On approval of your request, view the resume of the requested ones. You can view their resume just by clicking on VIEW RESUME button. You can contact your prospect regardless of approval. You also get a passcode. You can use this passcode in order to view the resume. For example, visit on your requested profile. Click on View Resume button. Enter the shown passcode and you can view the resume.

Reviews.viewApprovals: View your requested Resume on approval of your request
Reviews.checkApprovals: On approval of your request, view the resume of the requested ones. You can view their resume just by clicking on VIEW RESUME button. You can contact your prospect regardless of approval. You also get a passcode. You can use this passcode in order to view the resume. For example, visit on your requested profile. Click on View Resume button. Enter the shown passcode and you can view the resume.

ResumeEditor.resumeEditorTags: LeetCV, Resume Editor, Leet Editor, Resume Builder
ResumeEditor.resumeEditorDesc: Enhance your resume with LeetCV's Resume Editor. Easily edit and format your resume to perfection, with user-friendly tools designed to help you highlight your skills and achievements.
ResumeEditor.summary: Connect with me on leetCV and let's explore new opportunities together! 🚀
ResumeEditor.howDidYou: How did you hear about us ?
ResumeEditor.getTokens: Fill the details and get 200 tokens

OpenAIResume.updateResumeDesc: Feel free to enhance your resume by clicking the Update Resume button.
OpenAIResume.loginDesc: To access or download this resume, please log in.

Attestation.already: Already approved this project by some user please check status on outgoing attestation section
Attestation.emailAlreadyAdded: This email has already been added.
Attestation.notValidEmail: is not a valid email address.
Attestation.receivedAttestationRequestSubText: Carefully review project requirements, assess feasibility, and maintain communication for quality and user satisfaction.
Attestation.sendRequestAttestationSubText: Stay informed on your project's attestation status with real-time updates and transparent monitoring.
Attestation.projectValidation: To gain project validation, share attesters emails for credibility and recognition.
Attestation.upgradePlanDesc: Upgrade plan to enable peer attestation for project verification requests.
Attestation.multipleEmail: Multiple email addresses can be entered to obtain attestations.
Attestation.cantSendReq: You cannot send another request to the same person for the same project.
Attestation.trackAttestation: The status of attestation can be tracked on the outgoing attestation page.

Footer.paragraph: Resume of the future. For 20+ years we have been using PDF for resume, it is time to move forward to the new age of mobile responsive, sharable, passcode protected.
Footer.latestNews: The latest news, articles, and resources, sent to your inbox weekly.
Footer.scanQrCode: Scan the QR code to download the app.
